Web Development

For a well-documented source of all web-dev related topics, see: https://www.w3schools.com/whatis/. It’s a fantastic resource for finding a good path to take to get into web development.

Embedded Development

Here is a great resource for learning all about embedded development: https://embeddedartistry.com/beginners/

Related Languages: C, C++, Python, ASM

Standards: CPPISO (https://isocpp.org/), MISRA (https://www.misra.org.uk/)

frontmatter.title: Key Terms in Software Development
frontmatter.description: Software development encompasses a broad scope of jobs and responsibilities, each with their own specific tech stack they use. This list hopes to catalogue and de-mystify some of the terms used in the industry.

frontmatter.title: Learning What Ties This All Together!
